Issue.creator: scottz
Issue.summary: update pre-setup script path to install location
Issue.description: nvm is already installed in /home/ubuntu/.nvm, trying to update using git => error: pathspec 'v0.33.2' did not match any file(s) known to git. ... Line wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.33.2/install.sh | bash must be changed to use updated path such as v0.33.4 or even v0.33.8 >
